item.title: Pi Quest tab donator only help
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

give this a try

case 28168: if (c.isDonator == 1) c.sendMessage("you get some food"); 
		} else if (c.isDonator == 1) {
				c.getItems().addItem(392, 500);			

		} else {
			c.sendMessage("This is a donator only button.");
		}
	break;</blockquote>

item.title: Pi Quest tab donator only help
item.dc:creator: @lolpaelex lolpaelex
item.description:
@lolpaelex wrote:

i want to make it so when i click an item in my quest tab only donators recieve the item
base:pi SoulSplit
like this in clickingbuttons

case 28168:
if(c.isDonator = 1) {
c.getItems().addItem(392, 500);
}
break;

but when i click it i recieve the item but non donators can click it too. thanks.

Read full topic
